sentences.en: a scandal that sullied his reputation
Any further recalls will sully their reputations, perhaps irreparably.
sentences.cn: 再有任何召回事件都会玷污它们的声誉, 而且可能无法挽回.

sentences.en: Customer: Ah, I forgot to fill in. My name is Sully Thomas . My account number is 78007476.
sentences.cn: 顾客: 啊, 我忘记填写了. 我叫萨利·马斯. 我的帐号是78007476.

sentences.en: His reputation is sully by many crimes.
sentences.cn: 他的名誉被许多罪行玷污.

sentences.en: I felt loath to sully the gleaming brass knocker by handling it.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意伸手去抓那闪亮的黄铜门环，怕把它弄脏。

sentences.en: I wouldn't sully my hands by acceptinga bribe.
sentences.cn: 我决不接受贿赂,一尘不染.

sentences.en: Matrix : [ holds Sully upside - down over a cliff by his leg ] Listen, loyalty is very touching.
sentences.cn: 梅屈克: [ 用脚将萨利头朝下地撂倒在悬崖上 ] 听着, 忠诚是令人感动的.

sentences.en: Sully always kept in mind the air - crew ejection study he learned about in his military days.
sentences.cn: 萨伦伯格一直牢记着在部队服役时学的飞行人员弹射研究.

sentences.en: Sully was an earnest, hard - working student who paid close attention.
sentences.cn: 萨伦伯格是一名认真刻苦的学生,做事全神贯注.

sentences.en: Sully: I don't know. But Cooke knows, I'll take you to where I meet him!
sentences.cn: 萨利: 我不知道. 但库克知道, 我会带你去我同他会面的地方!

sentences.en: Sully: I'll say it a little louder, get fucked!
sentences.cn: 萨利: 我会大声地说一遍的, 你这操蛋的!

sentences.en: The 40 th minute , the Sully Huo Weiqi kick shoots to hit the right post to spring.
sentences.cn: 第40分钟, 萨利霍维奇的任意球射门击中右门柱弹出.

sentences.en: To profane or sully ( a good name, for example ).
sentences.cn: 败坏,糟蹋败坏或糟蹋 ( 例如,好名声 )

sentences.en: Who would want to sully the reputation of the nicest girl in school?
sentences.cn: 谁会想要玷污学校里最好的女孩的名声?

sentences.en: You shouldn't sully his character for no reason.
sentences.cn: 你不应该平白无故地污蔑他人格低下.

trans.tran_en: to spoil or reduce the value of something that was perfect
